zh_CN.text: 蓝灯与隐币是合作伙伴，购买蓝灯可免费获赠加密货币隐币！

zh_HK.text: 藍燈不收集任何個人信息，不與香港警察合作，忽略香港法院令！

US.text: Lantern has partnered with Yinbi to give free YNB to everyone that purchases Lantern Pro!

en_US.text: The wall is higher, but we are better. Get Lantern Pro and connected now!

en-US.text: The wall is higher, but we are better. Get Lantern Pro and connected now!

US.text: The wall is higher, but we are better. Get Lantern Pro and connected now!

en-US.content.desktop.body.free:
Lantern has partnered with Yinbi (YNB) to give YNB to everyone that purchases Lantern Pro! Purchase now to get access to today’s giveaway!

What is Yinbi?
en-US.content.desktop.body.main_screen.free:
Lantern has partnered with Yinbi (YNB) to give YNB to everyone that purchases Lantern Pro! Purchase now to get access to today’s giveaway!

What is Yinbi?
en-US.content.desktop.body.secondary_screen.fr: Lantern has partnered with Yinbi (YNB) to give YNB to everyone that purchases Lantern Pro! Purchase now to get access to today’s giveaway! Yinbi (YNB) is a new unblockable cryptocurrency launching soon that allows for fast, reliable, easy to use, and low-cost mobile transactions. Lantern users are the first to have early access to this new cryptocurrency! Find out more here: Yin.bi
en-US.content.desktop.body.pro:
Lantern has partnered with Yinbi (YNB) to give YNB to everyone that renews Lantern Pro! Renew now to get access to today’s giveaway!

What is Yinbi?
en-US.content.desktop.body.main_screen.pro:
Lantern has partnered with Yinbi (YNB) to give YNB to everyone that renews Lantern Pro! Renew now to get access to today’s giveaway!

What is Yinbi?
en-US.content.desktop.body.secondary_screen.pr: Lantern has partnered with Yinbi (YNB) to give YNB to everyone that renews Lantern Pro! Renew now to get access to today’s giveaway! Yinbi (YNB) is a new unblockable cryptocurrency launching soon that allows for fast, reliable, easy to use, and low-cost mobile transactions. Lantern users are the first to have early access to this new cryptocurrency! Find out more here: Yin.bi

en_US.content.desktop.subheader: 加密货币隐币免费赠送
en_US.content.desktop.body.free:
蓝灯与隐币(YNB)合作，蓝灯用户将免费获赠隐币。11月19日0点1分在蓝灯内正式开抢隐币！

隐币是什么？
en_US.content.desktop.body.main_screen.free:
蓝灯与隐币(YNB)合作，蓝灯用户将免费获赠隐币。11月19日0点1分在蓝灯内正式开抢隐币！

隐币是什么？
en_US.content.desktop.body.secondary_screen.fr: 隐币(YNB)即将发布，是无封锁的加密货币。隐币无外汇限制，瞬时安全跨国转账，低手续费。蓝灯用户能在第一时间获得这种加密货币。
en_US.content.desktop.body.pro:
蓝灯与隐币(YNB)合作，蓝灯用户将免费获赠隐币。11月19日0点1分在蓝灯内正式开抢隐币！

隐币是什么？
en_US.content.desktop.body.main_screen.pro:
蓝灯与隐币(YNB)合作，蓝灯用户将免费获赠隐币。11月19日0点1分在蓝灯内正式开抢隐币！

隐币是什么？
en_US.content.desktop.body.secondary_screen.pr: 隐币(YNB)即将发布，是无封锁的加密货币。隐币无外汇限制，瞬时安全跨国转账，低手续费。蓝灯用户能在第一时间获得这种加密货币。

zh_CN.content.desktop.body.free:
蓝灯与隐币是合作伙伴，早期用户抢先购买/续费获得更多隐币；随着参与用户更多，每日到手配额将逐渐下降。

YNB会根据当天发放隐币总量，当天购买/续费蓝灯专业版的数量和和时长，您购买/续费蓝灯专业版的数量和时长在每日日终发放。隐币兑换码日终生成后，请到yin.bi兑换隐币！

zh_CN.content.mobile.main_screen.free: 蓝灯与隐币是合作伙伴，升级到蓝灯5.2后，买蓝灯可免费获赠隐币！即刻购买，一起分享当日隐币配送。

YNB会根据当天发放隐币总量，当天购买/续费蓝灯专业版的数量和和时长，您购买/续费蓝灯专业版的数量和时长在每日日终发放。隐币兑换码日终生成后，请到yin.bi兑换隐币！
zh.content.desktop.body.secondary_screen.pr:
蓝灯与隐币是合作伙伴，早期用户抢先购买/续费获得更多隐币；随着参与用户更多，每日到手配额将逐渐下降。

YNB会根据当天发放隐币总量，当天购买/续费蓝灯专业版的数量和和时长，您购买/续费蓝灯专业版的数量和时长在每日日终发放。隐币兑换码日终生成后，请到yin.bi兑换隐币！
zh.content.mobile.main_screen.free: 蓝灯与隐币是合作伙伴，升级到蓝灯5.2后，购买蓝灯可免费获赠隐币！隐币每日发放量指数减少，即刻购买，一起分享当日隐币配送。
zh.content.mobile.secondary_screen.free: YNB会根据当天发放隐币总量，当天购买/续费数量和购买/续费时长，在每日日终发放。
zh.content.mobile.main_screen.pro: 蓝灯与隐币是合作伙伴，升级到蓝灯5.2后，购买蓝灯可免费获赠隐币！隐币每日发放量指数减少，即刻购买，一起分享当日隐币配送。
zh.content.mobile.secondary_screen.pro: YNB会根据当天发放隐币总量，当天购买/续费数量和购买/续费时长，在每日日终发放。
